A widget for handling HTTP requests

assignments.title: Lab 01: Flutter Basics
assignments.description: Complete the basic Flutter exercises including widget creation and state management.

assignments.title: Lab 02: State Management
assignments.description: Implement state management using Provider and Riverpod.

announcements.title: Lab Session Schedule
announcements.content: Lab sessions will be held every Monday and Wednesday. Please check the schedule for your group.

announcements.title: Welcome to Cross-Platform Mobile Development!
announcements.content: Welcome to the course! We will be learning Flutter and Dart to build amazing mobile applications.Please review the syllabus attached below.
